title: The Isley Brothers - Super Hits@320
description:
The Isley Brothers have had a number of greatest-hits compilations over the years, highlighted by Rhino&#039;s exhaustive two-volume retrospective The Isley Brothers Story. Since it&#039;s a budget-line compilation, Super Hits doesn&#039;t come close to matching that glorious set, but it&#039;s a surprisingly effective summary of their T-Neck recordings, containing their biggest hits for the label -- "It&#039;s Your Thing," "Fight the Power (Parts 1 & 2)," "That Lady (Parts 1 & 2)," "Who Loves You Better" -- plus an interesting selection of smaller hits and album tracks, including "Summer Breeze," "Freedom" and "All in My Lover&#039;s Eyes." It may not be definitive, but for casual fans on a strict budget, it certainly provides their money&#039;s worth. (AMG)



01. It&#039;s Your Thing                                                                                                
02. Fight The Power (Part 1 & 2)                                                                                   
03. The Heat Is On (Part 1 & 2)                                                                                    
04. That Lady (Part 1 & 2)                                                                                         
05. Summer Breeze                                                                                                  
06. Who Loves You Better                                                                                           
07. The Pride (Part 1 & 2)                                                                                         
08. Freedom                                                                                                        
09. Caravan Of Love                                                                                                
10. All In My Lover&#039;s Eyes       


Recording Date: 1968-1985
Label: Sony
Date: May 4, 1999
